Content: 22 Officers and 698 Other Ranks of the Security Force Headquarters - Kilinochchi on Monday (9) received knowledge on 'Human Rights' following arrangements made by Major General Vijitha Ravipriya, Commander, Security Forces - Kilinochchi. The educative lecture was delivered by Major N.P.E.N Nerangama of 5 Sri Lanka Corps of Military Police at the Nelumpiyasa auditorium.
